column4: hey guys.. i was wondering if someone could either offer a tutorial or just help me setup gparted for dual booting windows and ubuntu 10.10?
guess i'll try installing ubuntu now :D
if i post a screenshot can you guys tel me if i did it right please?
sure where is the screenshot again
and no you do not want /boot on a ntfs partition it has to be a linux filesystem.  but it will be in / like they said
but if you open details or whatever it should show what it is doing .. hmm actually if I rememebr right there is a little black area below the progress bar showing commands
well it's been in beta awhile and the release candidate actually came out awhile back so versions were probably frozen at that point
right but there is a setting  to install updates during the install
that is what I did today
well there is a box below the progress bar that tells you what it is doing
the actual console output form the commands
then that is what it is doing
